text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa, arrā igai no kago o dōshite motomerudarou ka. Kare wa ten to ji no sōzō-sha de,(subete o) yashinai,(dare karamo) yashinawa renai' itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa (kare ni) fukujū, kie suru mono no sakiki kake to nari,“tashinkyō to no nakama to natte wa naranai” to meiji rareta
